items.sentence: I would be happy to speak to Tom about that matter.
It\'ll take me a long time to read all those books.
Can you tell me the way to the nearest post office?
Could you please tell me how to get to the airport?
Did Tom mention why the police are looking for him?
Did Tom really tell Mary not to come here tomorrow?
I have an appointment I don\'t want to be late for.
I have an older brother who\'s the same age as you.
Tom doubts if Mary will come to his birthday party.
What\'s your favorite song in last year\'s top 100?
